thread.title: Delightful hotel in a good position with very helpful staff
thread.title_full: Delightful hotel in a good position with very helpful staff - Review of Hotel Arc de Triomphe Etoile, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: PeterL40
title: Delightful hotel in a good position with very helpful staff
text:
My wife and I, plus my sister, booked a couple of rooms for 4 nights and were delighted with our stay. the rooms were comfortable, well decorated in a modern style, and the staff were all extremely helpful. We took breakfast in the hotel but also went out and had breakfast in local bars. The hotel is well positioned - a short walk from the Arc de Triomphe where there is good access to the metro. We travelled from Gare du Nord to Arc de Triomphe by 31 bus - takes a long time, but is more interesting that the metro. A hotel we will consider using again.
Room Tip: Room 11 is on ground floor, has a 'wet room' shower, good for people with mobility problems. See more room tips
